title: Food Process
summary:
Food Process & Machine Operator – Carole Park location

What’s the gig?
We’re Recruit Masters, the blue-collar specialists who know our way around a production line as well as you do. Right now, our food-manufacturing clients (think household names) need switched-on operators to keep the lines humming across their Carole Park site.

Day to day
* Setting up, running and tweaking high-speed processing & packing machinery
* Handling raw meat on halal-certified lines 
* Quality checks that’d make your mum proud – temp, weight, seals, the works
* Cleaning & sanitising gear so the food-safety auditors stay happy
* Teaming up with crew and supervisors to smash shift targets safely

Shift options
✅Day shifts:kick-off anywhere between 4 am – 7 am
✅Arvo shifts:start around 1:30 pm
✅Lock in a regular roster – show us you’re reliable 

You’ll fit right in if you…
✅Have previous food-processing or machine-operating experience (bonus points for both)
✅Can lift up to \~20 kg and stay on your feet all shift
✅Understand HACCP/GMP basics – or are keen to learn fast
✅Can pass a pre-employment medical, drug & alcohol test and reference checks
✅Bring great attitude, solid work ethic, and zero drama – simple!

Why jump on board?
* Steady hours with overtime when production peaks
* Work with industry-leading brands (looks good on the résumé)
* Supportive supervisors, and genuine pathways to permanent hire 
* Weekly pay and occasional!

Sound like your next move?
Apply Now or contact us directly to secure your spot.
Recruit Masters values diversity. We believe that a diverse and inclusive workforce fosters innovation and creativity, contributing to a positive and dynamic working environment.
All qualified candidates are welcome to apply, and we are committed to ensuring equal opportunities throughout our recruitment process.
*Please note only shortlisted applicants will be contacted.


Recruit Masters – we’ve worn the hi-vis, now we hire the hi-vis.

#SCR-selena-vitale

title: HC Truck Driver
summary:
Our client  is seeking a talented and reliable HC Truck Driver to join their team based in Wacol. As a key member of the crew, you'll play a vital role in keeping operations running smoothly, ensuring their fleet of trucks are well-maintained and ready to hit the road.
What You'll Bring to the Table:

A passion and  commitment to safe, efficient driving practices
A keen eye for detail and a proactive approach to yard work, moving trucks in and out of the wash bay and into their designated parking spots
A flexible and adaptable mindset, ready to tackle a range of tasks, from minimal off-road work to nearby site visits
Preferred Requirements:
Extensive experience operating HC-class vehicles, with a strong understanding of their unique handling and performance characteristics
Excellent communication skills, enabling you to collaborate effectively with our team and respond promptly to any requests or concerns
A commitment to safety, with a clean driving record and the ability to follow all relevant regulations and protocols
A solutions-oriented mindset, able to think on your feet and adapt to changing circumstances with ease
A keen eye for detail and a proactive approach to maintaining the  organisation of our vehicle fleet
Preferred Qualifications:
A valid HC driver's license, with a proven track record of safe and responsible driving
Relevant experience in the transportation and logistics industry, preferably in a similar role
A strong understanding of vehicle maintenance and the ability to identify and address any issues that may arise

Sound like your next move?
Apply Now or contact us directly to secure your spot.
Recruit Masters values diversity. We believe that a diverse and inclusive workforce fosters innovation and creativity, contributing to a positive and dynamic working environment.
All qualified candidates are welcome to apply, and we are committed to ensuring equal opportunities throughout our recruitment process.
*Please note only shortlisted applicants will be contacted.
